dataset_name: Primary School Enrollment vs GDP per Capita (2001-2020)
description: Merged dataset showing primary school enrollment and GDP per capita for one country from 2001 to 2020.

columns.name: Primary_Enrollment
columns.description: Total primary school enrollment for that year (number of students).

columns.name: GDP_per_capita
columns.description: GDP per capita in current US dollars for that year.

source.gdp: World Bank, WDI indicator GDP per capita
